blog.name: everyl1ttleth1ng
blog.title: Agents of Unbearable Awkwardness
blog.description: a receptacle for my feels and fics

tags: in which Gendry finds someone to gush to
summary: Doomed - Chapter 10 - everyl1ttleth1ng - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
title: Doomed - Chapter 10 - everyl1ttleth1ng - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Timm watched Gendry eagerly until he continued with his story.

“Here’s how it was. First time I saw Arya after years and years apart, mind you, me thinking she was dead, her probably thinking I was dead - just the sight of her almost actually killed me. I just stood there gaping at her, trying to fathom how that slip of a kid I’d left behind had become this incredibly beautiful woman.”

“So she’s beautiful?”

Gendry grinned. “Gods, yes. I’ve never laid eyes on another woman like her. She’s got dark hair and these grey eyes and she’s tiny actually, for someone so powerful. I get all a bit useless around her truthfully. Which is deadly, of course, ‘cause she was always sneaking up on me in the forge, but I think I’ve mostly covered it up so far.”

Timm chuckled. “You really are in love with her, aren’t you?”

“Didn’t I already say that? Pay attention!”

title: PSA for Fanfic Writers
body:
When one places the notch of an arrow on the bowstring, it’s spelled “nock” not “knock.”

https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/nock

Thanks for coming to my TED Talk and happy writing :)

summary: Im not good editing videos but I know a lot of people here can, so I let you my ideas with GoT soundtrack if someone can make...
body:
Im not good editing videos but I know a lot of people here can, so I let you my ideas with GoT soundtrack if someone can make them would be fantastic:

Power is power

The first parts are all about Jonerys but the rap part is so Arya and have a pieces about Jaime, the main part applies to Sansa and Tyrion aswell, also Cersei.

First part - Jon Snow

Second part - Daenerys Targaryen

Third part (rap) - A combination between Arya Stark and Jaime Lannister.

Last part: Sansa and Tyrion, also Cersei.

Wolf at your Door

This is obviously the Stark Sisters song

First Part: Sansa Stark

Second Part: Arya Stark

Rest of the song: Combination of both

Baptize me, this song is about redemption so is perfect for: Theon, Jaime and Sandor

Love Can Kill, this song fits perfectly for the suffer of all the ships in GoT especially: Jonerys, Gendrya (there are parts like is Arya saying Gendry💔) Gussandei and Braime.

Hollow Crown: Perfect for Queens Sansa, Daenerys and Cersei

Nigthshade: This is about lost bc of war so: House Stark, Lannister, Tyrell, Baratheon and all Daenerys lost.

When I lie: This song fits perfectly for Daenerys, Arya and Cersei and her bit of craziness and how man can’t catch them, it can be from the Jaime, Gendry and Jon perspective.

Too many Gods: Perfect for guys who fight for survival, honor or family but at the end of the day they don’t want the throne or power just survive and their lover ones safe: Jon, Jaime, Gendry, Sandor, Jorah, Greyworm, Davos and Theon.

So if you decides to make a video with these let me know, because when I listen the song I imagine them but I haven’t found videos with their specifically 💔

summary: You guys want to know what would of been “POETIC CINEMA” if Missandei had captured  one of those deadly Butterfly’s from the...
body: You guys want to know what would of been “POETIC CINEMA” if Missandei had captured  one of those deadly Butterfly’s from the Island of Naath as a pet and let one loose right before Cersei’s would kill her in the long run giving Cersei’s a Deadly fever where she would first miscarry her child and then died a slow and painful death asking Jamie to take her out of her misery and him stabbing her. That still would of been better than a BUNCH OF FUCKING ROCKS!!

summary: You know D&D have done things wrong with Season 8 when you have to invent and detail in your fanfiction how the characters are...
body:
You know D&D have done things wrong with Season 8 when you have to invent and detail in your fanfiction how the characters are feeling after the ending. 

I try to write but then, I have to spend some time detailing what the characters think about what happened in King’s Landing (and in all of Season 8, truth be told). I cannot just go straight into the action because the action wouldn’t make any sense if you don’t know why the characters are doing such or such thing. Season 8 didn’t give us a clue about anyone’s motivations or feelings or thoughts except when they stated it clearly.

How does Jon feel after killing Daenerys, and what eventually led him to do it? What were Sansa’s feelings about being crowned Queen and Jon being beyond the Wall? What really motivated Arya’s early departure, and how does she live with the trauma she went through? Has Brienne really forgiven Jaime – and how did she came to it? What are Tyrion’s projects now, how does he perceive his own actions? Or even, why did Jaime decide suddenly that he was better off with Cersei, and who did he love, truly?

I could go on and on like that. It’s very frustrating. It’s not my job or yours to spend time thinking how the characters must feel now and to write it down clearly so that your fic can be as close to the characters as it can - it was D&D’s job. 

It’s incredibly frustrating having to write paragraphs to explain how the characters feel now. Well, I like this kind of thing; what is frustrating is to make it interesting. You can’t just go on and write chapters that only state things, and yet, in this particular case, I have to do it. Finding new ways to do it every time there is a new POV so that it seems natural enough and not too repetitive is the exhausting part.

tags: my brother actually tried the toaster thing.. twice
summary:
So a month ago my brain was like:
“What about Arya being an Olympic level archer who was originally taught by Theon after he...
body:
So a month ago my brain was like:


“What about Arya being an Olympic level archer who was originally taught by Theon after he stole a bow and arrows after he and Robb came home from summer camp one year and Arya loses a trickshot competition against Theon on purpose because the rule was that if he won she had to be his best woman at his wedding to Robb. And Gendry totally calls her out on it later and she tells him he’s just mad she called dibs on Jon being her best man before he could.”

and ever since then I’ve been obsessedly thinking about all the shenanigans they’d get up to. I need fics about Arya and Theon being absolute menaces together growing up. Who decided to try and cook frozen crumbed chicken in the toaster? Theon after Arya dared him to. Who “accidentally” put an arrow through the only picture on the wall of Arya in a dress? Arya but honestly it wasn’t her fault that Theon insisted they try the apple on the head trick in that specific location. Who did Arya ask for tips on sneaking Gendry out of her bedroom? Theon. Who got Theon absolutely hammered because she was sick of him pining over her brother? Arya and she recorded the whole thing on her phone. Arya and Theon egging each other on yelling “DO IT FOR THE VINE!”.

And poor Robb and Gendry bond over having to deal with Theon and Arya.

And Gendry totally calls her out on it later and she tells him he’s just mad she called dibs on Jon being her best man before he could.”

and ever since then I’ve been obsessedly thinking about all the shenanigans they’d get up to. I need fics about Arya and Theon being absolute menaces together growing up. Who decided to try and cook frozen crumbed chicken in the toaster? Theon after Arya dared him to. Who “accidentally” put an arrow through the only picture on the wall of Arya in a dress? Arya but honestly it wasn’t her fault that Theon insisted they try the apple on the head trick in that specific location. Who did Arya ask for tips on sneaking Gendry out of her bedroom? Theon. Who got Theon absolutely hammered because she was sick of him pining over her brother? Arya and she recorded the whole thing on her phone. Arya and Theon egging each other on yelling “DO IT FOR THE VINE!”.

And poor Robb and Gendry bond over having to deal with Theon and Arya.

trail.content_raw:
So a month ago my brain was like:


“What about Arya being an Olympic level archer who was originally taught by Theon after he stole a bow and arrows after he and Robb came home from summer camp one year and Arya loses a trickshot competition against Theon on purpose because the rule was that if he won she had to be his best woman at his wedding to Robb. And Gendry totally calls her out on it later and she tells him he’s just mad she called dibs on Jon being her best man before he could.”

and ever since then I’ve been obsessedly thinking about all the shenanigans they’d get up to. I need fics about Arya and Theon being absolute menaces together growing up. Who decided to try and cook frozen crumbed chicken in the toaster? Theon after Arya dared him to. Who “accidentally” put an arrow through the only picture on the wall of Arya in a dress? Arya but honestly it wasn’t her fault that Theon insisted they try the apple on the head trick in that specific location. Who did Arya ask for tips on sneaking Gendry out of her bedroom? Theon. Who got Theon absolutely hammered because she was sick of him pining over her brother? Arya and she recorded the whole thing on her phone. Arya and Theon egging each other on yelling “DO IT FOR THE VINE!”.

And poor Robb and Gendry bond over having to deal with Theon and Arya.

“What about Arya being an Olympic level archer who was originally taught by Theon after he stole a bow and arrows after he and Robb came home from summer camp one year and Arya loses a trickshot competition against Theon on purpose because the rule was that if he won she had to be his best woman at his wedding to Robb. summary:
"You were very attentive to our dragon queen," Arya noted. 
"Small civilities go a long way," Sansa returned with a...
body:
“You were very attentive to our dragon queen,” Arya noted.

“Small civilities go a long way,” Sansa returned with a sigh.

Dialogue which we deserved in S8

summary: The King is Dead, Long Live the King - Imperium - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: The King is Dead, Long Live the King - Imperium - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Jon in the Night’s Watch tries and fails to keep his shit together.

Featuring: Unstable Jon, A very much alive Rhaegal, Supportive Stark Sisters - and me trying to make sense of the Mad Queen Narrative - as I have a total thing for hero to villain arcs.

Trigger Warning: Dany’s behavior may be interpreted as abusive; while Jon’s borders on the same. It depends entirely on how you see their relationship. Trigger warnings for Jon’s suicidal behavior and hints of alcohol abuse.

summary: got a lil prompt on twitter so thought i’d post it over here too x d&d can’t convince me this didn’t happen[[MORE]] They'd been...
body:
got a lil prompt on twitter so thought i’d post it over here too x d&d can’t convince me this didn’t happen

They’d been at sea for all of a week and Arya couldn’t sleep. The sea had been uncooperative and Starks weren’t built for it. At least, that’s what she’d said when she’d gone green for the first time, much to Gendry’s amusement. He’d said he knew best, knew how a rocky wave could turn one’s stomach without effort. Arya told him to piss off and he’d laughed even harder, bent over just in time for the ship to rock and for him to end up face first against the deck.

Now, he was snoring by her side, stomach down and his arm flung over her waist. It had taken three conversations for either of them to agree to the terms of, this, them. His proposal had been a result of drunken excitement, butchered in delivery but not in intention. He’d meant what he’d said though, in loving her and wanting to be with her.

And that’s what had mattered in the end.

The ship rocked gently, especially when compared to earlier in the day. The sea could be heard, sloshing around them as Arya stretched her legs out over him, a hand resting against his hip. His snoring had ceased and she looked at him, thumb rubbing against his skin.

“I love you.” Came his muffled voice, one blue eye cracking open to look at her.

Arya exhaled softly, carding her fingers through his slowly returning hair. There was no pit in her stomach. No fear. Just -

“I love you too.” She smiled, leaning over to kiss his temple. “Now shove over, or you can sleep on the deck.”
body_abstract: got a lil prompt on twitter so thought i’d post it over here too x d&d can’t convince me this didn’t happen

tags: literally all women in this show
summary: As a woman in Game of Thrones you have options.
body:
As a woman in Game of Thrones you have options.

You can be a caring mother and wife. Like Catelyn Stark, Ellaria Sand and Olenna Tyrell.

You can be a woman in power and a commander of men. Like Daenerys Targaryen, Cersei Lannister and Sansa Stark.

You can be a warrior and an adventurer. Like Arya Stark, Yara Greyjoy, Lyanna Mormont and Brienne of Tarth.

You can be innocent and kind to people. Like Myrcella Baratheon, Missandei of Narth and Margaery Tyrell.

But there’s an ‘or’ between them. You can be a mother and a wife OR you can be a warrior OR you can be in power OR you can be innocent and kind.

________________________________________

Arya Stark is only an assassin.

Not a wife, not a mother, not a friend, not a sister.

Brienne of Tarth is only a knight.

Not in love, not a Lady.

Yara Greyjoy is only an adventurer.

Not a Queen on a throne of salt.

Sansa Stark is only in power.

Not part of a pack, not a wife or a mother.

________________________________________

You can only be one because, according to David and Dan, women can’t be more. And the women who tried to be more? They died trying.
